item.title: Good advice from mr. Gruber for budding iPhone developers
item.description: Want to implement anti-piracy mechanisms in your new iPhone app? I agree with most these recommendations for ways of dealing with this issue. However, I think that blocking all jail-broken phones would be a big mistake.
